title: Senior Counsel (m/f) - Litigation - fixed term gefunden bei General Electric
subtitle: Vienna
body:
Über diese Stellenanzeige

Role Summary:The role will handle disputes and contentious matters for GE’s Steam Power business and will work on global litigation/arbitration portfolio.

Essential Responsibilities:


+ Handle the resolution disputes and contentious matters for GE’s Steam Power business


+ Provide strategic advice to business leadership on matters relating to dispute resolution



+ Coordinate arbitration and litigation related activities on behalf of the business, and prepare relevant periodical status reports


+ Appoint and manage outside counsel, including minimize the cost of outside counsel





Qualifications/Requirements:


+ University Degree in Law


+ Admission to practice in a common law or civil law jurisdiction


+ At least 10 years of post-qualification experience gained from working with law firm and/or legal department of a corporation


+ Solid experience in dispute resolution (arbitration and/or litigation) is a must.


+ Experience in international arbitration involving construction disputes. Deep understanding of Power EPC business.






Lohn ab 80'000 EUR brutto pro Jahr.



About Us:GE (NYSE:GE) drives the world forward by tackling its biggest challenges. By combining world-class engineering with software and analytics, GE helps the world work more efficiently, reliably, and safely. GE people are global, diverse and dedicated, operating with the highest integrity and passion to fulfill GE’s mission and deliver for our customers. www.ge.comAdditional Locations:Austria;Vienna;
